locations.title: Arsenal Charm +1
locations.description: Altus Tunnel, from a sidepath deep in the tunnel, on top of a wooden structure which requires dropping down to a branch to access. The rock-slinging Malformed Star from Perfumer's Grotto will attack you here as well
